PerfectNetExp.abs: 夜莺属于鸫科（Turdidae ）。夜莺的拉丁学名是Luscinia megarhynchos；画眉夜莺的拉丁学名是L. luscinia。

means.word_mean: 1. thrushes; in some classifications considered a subfamily (Turdinae) of the family Muscicapidae
